channel.title: Enable /compass for normal members?
channel.description:
What good is the map of the server if you yourself cant determine which direction you are facing in-game? :|
Yea well topic title explains my request :P
Would appreciate this.

item.title: Enable /compass for normal members?
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

It already exists, and it’s called zans minimap mod.

Read full topic

item.title: Enable /compass for normal members?
item.dc:creator: @aaronuk12 aaronuk12
item.description:
@aaronuk12 wrote:

Compass i have never used a compass before i dont really see the reason of using one well if you needed one use mods and if you dont like using mods then unlucky. :L lol someone should make a minecraft client looking like runescape with the mini map and the inventory it will be good invention maybe a experienced minecraft cracked server creator could do it just thinking :P.

Read full topic

item.title: Enable /compass for normal members?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Admins can /setspawn, otherwise mods are identical.

Read full topic

item.title: Enable /compass for normal members?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“LilXCj, post:16, topic:391100”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=487050.msg3570049#msg3570049 date=1302974416]

Considering I don’t think even we have access to the compass, I doubt you will

admins cant use compass? never heard of that… >_>

There are no ‘admins’ in that sense of the word on this server. The only power the admins on this server have over the regular users is to ban people and roll back greifers with Big Brother, and absolutely nothing else at all.

But no, this won’t be added, since we are trying to stick with a vanilla server here. All I can tell you is if you want a compass, make one.
[/quote]

Wouldn’t that technically put mods in the same group as admins in that sense? Considering we can rollback now.[/quote]Pretty much, but we can view IPS

Read full topic

item.title: Enable /compass for normal members?
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:14, topic:391100”][quote author=badger41 link=topic=487050.msg3569714#msg3569714 date=1302944972]

Considering I don’t think even we have access to the compass, I doubt you will

admins cant use compass? never heard of that… >_>
[/quote]

There are no ‘admins’ in that sense of the word on this server. The only power the admins on this server have over the regular users is to ban people and roll back greifers with Big Brother, and absolutely nothing else at all.

But no, this won’t be added, since we are trying to stick with a vanilla server here. All I can tell you is if you want a compass, make one.[/quote]

Wouldn’t that technically put mods in the same group as admins in that sense? Considering we can rollback now.

Read full topic

item.title: Enable /compass for normal members?
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

On a placed cobblestont/netherrack block, the L always points north.
Clouds also always move north.

Read full topic

item.title: Enable /compass for normal members?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“badger41, post:6, topic:391100”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=487050.msg3569694#msg3569694 date=1302941841]
Considering I don’t think even we have access to the compass, I doubt you will
[/quote]

admins cant use compass? never heard of that… >_>[/quote]

There are no ‘admins’ in that sense of the word on this server. The only power the admins on this server have over the regular users is to ban people and roll back greifers with Big Brother, and absolutely nothing else at all.

But no, this won’t be added, since we are trying to stick with a vanilla server here. All I can tell you is if you want a compass, make one.

Read full topic

item.title: Enable /compass for normal members?
item.dc:creator: @xryz xryz
item.description:

Look up at the clouds the always go north and to your right is east
[/quote]

u can use coords or u can make a compass.[/quote]

that takes materials which i dont currently have because i started not too long ago…
[/quote]

ill make u one then.

Read full topic
